Name: Aphthitalite (K,Na)_3Na(SO_4)_2
Type: Mineral
Class: Sulfates
Subclass: 
Particle Size: 125-500um
Sample No.: SO-9A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VNIR-SWIR
Origin: USA, California, San Bernadino County, Searles Lake
Collected by Burminco
Description: 





Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units:  Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:  Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:   0.40
Last X Value:   2.50
Number of X Values:  826
Additional Information: so09aa.txt
